name: Bean Dying
description:
Game made by:

- ShironatsuKun (twitch.tv) / Reien (itch.io) / Jude Cabal

- Kametsu15 / John Maurell Agbada (itch.io, to be added as a collaborator below as they haven't accepted the invite yet)

This is our first time doing a game jam and submitting a game. Thank you!

Note:

There are known bugs in the game so please don't expect a perfect game. Had to keep the bugs for now until I get to figure out how to fix it. Thank you for understanding.

Story:

- One day in a peaceful land, a malicious evil named Death Wizard transported the heroic Jellybean named Beany to a seemingly safe but dangerous land filled with Death Wizard's traps to destroy the hero once and for all. In a place where trying again is infinite, but constantly dying will crush anyone's soul.

- Help Beany recover his Coins of Hope to combat Death Wizard's power that is enveloping this land and escape this horrible place so our hero can save the world again.

- Find the Red Faith Chests to meddle with Death's power and store Beany's Mystic Powers inside for future use.

- Find Blue Royal Chests to help Beany safely progress through this dangerous land.

Controls:

- A & D: Move Left and Right respectively

- Spacebar: Jump

- ESC / P: Pause the game

- Retry button on the Pause Menu: Restarts the level and the difficulty

Special Thanks:

Oddroom for their music upload on OpenGameArt.org

Link to the work: https://opengameart.org/content/music-loop-variations

Peludo for the swimming SFX

Link to page: https://itch.io/profile/peludo

GboxMikeFozzy for the footsteps SFX

Link to the work: https://opengameart.org/content/footsteps-0

BayatGames for the free assets in Unity Store

Link to store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-platform-game-assets-...

All the project files and assets can be downloaded on the button below.

Thank you for your time! Enjoy the game!
